name: Rocket thing (yeah)
description:
Rocket thing is a game in which you try to fly as far as possible. You control a small rocket that flies upwards when you press space. You can unlock new rockets with coins.
Enjoy the music and the pixel art style.
Avoid hitting planets with your rocket or you will die.

Also available on Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.LeChuck_42.RocketThing
